00012   class Stat_t {
00013   public:
00014     friend std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &os, Stat_t &a);
00015     
00016     Stat_t() : _weight(0.),_sum(0.),_sum2(0.) {};
00017     void reset() {_weight=0.;_sum=0.; _sum2=0.;}
00018     void add(Float_t value, Float_t weight=1.) {_weight+=weight; _sum+=value*weight; _sum2+=value*value*weight; };
00019     void calculate() {
00020       if (_weight>1) {
00021         Double_t mean=_sum/_weight;
00022         Double_t sigma=sqrt((_sum2-mean*_sum)/(_weight-1));
00023         _mean=mean;
00024         _sigma=sigma;
00025       }
00026     };
00027     Double_t mean() const {return _mean;};
00028     Double_t sigma() const {return _sigma;};
00029     
00030   protected:
00031     Double_t  _weight;
00032     Double_t _sum;
00033     Double_t _mean;
00034     Double_t _sum2;
00035     Double_t _sigma;
00036   };

00042   class Box
00043   {
00044   public:
00045     Box() {reset();};
00046 
00049     void reset() {_hits.clear();for(UInt_t i=0; i<3;i++) {_low[i]=FLT_MAX; _high[i]=-FLT_MAX;_mean[i].reset();};_merged=false;};
00050 
00055     void add(const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *a_hit) {
00056 #ifdef CAN_CAST_CALORIMETERHIT_GETPOSITION
00057       const ThreeVector_t *pointP=reinterpret_cast<const ThreeVector_t *>(a_hit->getPosition());
00058       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3; i++) {
00059         if ((*pointP)[i]<_low[i]) {_low[i]=(*pointP)[i];};
00060         if ((*pointP)[i]>_high[i]) {_high[i]=(*pointP)[i];};
00061         _mean[i].add((*pointP)[i]);
00062       }
00063 #else
00064       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3; i++) {
00065         if ((a_hit->getPosition())[i]<_low[i]) {_low[i]=(a_hit->getPosition())[i];};
00066         if ((a_hit->getPosition())[i]>_high[i]) {_high[i]=(a_hit->getPosition())[i];};
00067         _mean[i].add((a_hit->getPosition())[i]);
00068       }
00069 #endif
00070       _hits.push_back(a_hit);
00071     };
00072 
00077     void add(const Box &a) {
00078       for( std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit*>::const_iterator hit_iter=a._hits.begin();
00079            hit_iter!=a._hits.end();
00080            hit_iter++) {
00081         add(*hit_iter);
00082       }
00083     };
00084 
00087     Bool_t closerToEnvelopThan(Float_t distance, const ThreeVector_t *a) const {
00088       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3;i++) {
00089         if (_low[i]-(*a)[i]>distance || (*a)[i]-_high[i]>distance) return false;
00090       }
00091       return true;
00092     };
00093 
00096     Bool_t closerToEnvelopThan(Float_t distance, const Box &a_cluster) const {
00097       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3;i++) {
00098         if (_low[i]-a_cluster._high[i]>distance || a_cluster._low[i]-_high[i]>distance) return false;
00099       }
00100       return true;
00101     };
00102 
00105     Double_t minDistanceToPoints(const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *a_hit) const {
00106 
00107 #ifdef CAN_CAST_CALORIMETERHIT_GETPOSITION      
00108       const ThreeVector_t *hit_point=reinterpret_cast<const ThreeVector_t *>(a_hit->getPosition());
00109 #else
00110       ThreeVector_t a_hit_point;
00111       a_hit_point.set(a_hit->getPosition());
00112       const ThreeVector_t *hit_point=&a_hit_point;
00113 #endif
00114       return minDistanceToPoints(hit_point);
00115     };
00116 
00119     Double_t minDistanceToPoints(const ThreeVector_t *hit_point) const {
00120       Double_t min_distance2=FLT_MAX;
00121       for( std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit*>::const_iterator hit_iter=_hits.begin();
00122            hit_iter!=_hits.end();
00123            hit_iter++) {
00124 #ifdef CAN_CAST_CALORIMETERHIT_GETPOSITION
00125         const ThreeVector_t *pointP=reinterpret_cast<const ThreeVector_t *>((*hit_iter)->getPosition());
00126 #else
00127         ThreeVector_t temp;
00128         temp.set((*hit_iter)->getPosition());
00129         const ThreeVector_t *pointP=&temp;
00130 #endif
00131         Double_t temp_scalar=dotOfDifference(*hit_point,*pointP);
00132         if (temp_scalar<min_distance2) {min_distance2=temp_scalar;};
00133       }
00134       return sqrt(min_distance2);
00135     };

00139     void show() {
00140       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3; i++) {
00141         _mean[i].calculate();
00142         std::cout << _mean[i].sigma();
00143         if (i<2) {
00144           std::cout << ", ";
00145         }
00146       }
00147       std::cout << std::endl;
00148       for( std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>::const_iterator hit_iter=_hits.begin();
00149            hit_iter!=_hits.end();
00150            hit_iter++) {
00151         std::cout << "\t";
00152         for (UInt_t i=0; i<3; i++) {
00153           std::cout << (*hit_iter)->getPosition()[i];
00154           if (i<2) {
00155             std::cout << ", ";
00156           }
00157         }
00158         std::cout << std::endl;
00159       }
00160     };
00161     
00164     void calculateSize() {
00165       for (UInt_t i=0; i<3; i++) {
00166         _mean[i].calculate();
00167       }
00168     };
00169 
00173     Double_t getSize(UInt_t i) const {return _mean[i].sigma();};
00174 
00179     Bool_t isMerged() const {return _merged;};
00180 
00183     void setMerged() {_merged=true;};

00185     ThreeVector_t _low;
00186     ThreeVector_t _high;
00187     //    std::vector<const ThreeVector_t *> _pointsP;
00188     std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit*> _hits; 
00189     Stat_t _mean[3];                                 
00190     Bool_t _merged;                                  
00191   };

00193   inline std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &os, Stat_t &a) {
00194     os << a._weight << ":" << a._mean << "+-" << a._sigma;
00195     return os;
